hanzi-su-wiki:
徹

Значения

Проходить, пронизывать; пропускать; достигать

Мнемоника

Осуществлять 彳 уход за ребёнком, пока тот не начнет питаться мясом 月. Рука с палкой 夂 символизирует строгость воспитания.

Варианты

彻
purpleculture_pinyin:
chè
thorough; penetrating; to pervade; to pass through
тщательный; проникающий; проникать; пройти через
rtega_mnemonic:
徹徹RS
彻彻		penetrate, pervade, destroy, remove
  • RS. a hand 攵 destroying a jug (育: fragile like the body of a baby): → 徹; while walking on the road 彳: penetrate
  • ⓢ go walking 彳 with seven 七 times the force 刀 of normal people: penetrate into and destroy things
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 彻)
Pictophonetic: 彳 indicates the sound; 切 (cut) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
徹底 [ chè dǐ ]: thorough; thoroughly; complete
徹夜 [ chè yè ]: the whole night
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿲ Left to middle and right
    • 彳 [ chì ] to step with the left foot
    • 育 [ yù ] to produce, to give birth to; to educate
    • 攵 [ pū ] to rap, to tap; script; to let go
heisig_chinese_memo: Children line up to get a thorough education from the taskmaster. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: penetrate, Nelson, column, going, line, borstal, bring up, infant, toddler, top hat, elbow, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, taskmaster
Keyword_KANJIDIC: penetrate, clear, pierce, strike home, sit up (all night)
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: всепроникающий, ясно, прокол, удар домой, сидеть (всю ночь)
koohiiStory1: The taskmistress in a moment of weakness allowed the man´s column to penetrate her. As punishment he was made to bring up their infant.
koohiiStory2: Ha! In this frame, a bunch of taskmasters are lined up to penetrate the kids they raise/bring up! I´m thinking of some priests and choir boys.
jp_example_words:
徹する(てっする): to sink in, to penetrate, to devote oneself, to believe in, to go through, to do intently and exclusively
徹底(てってい): thoroughness, completeness
徹夜(てつや): all night, all-night vigil, sleepless night
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You decide to loiter next to the trash under the moon in winter so the moon's light will penetrate you. The sky is clearest in winter, and this spot next to the trash happens to get the most of it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture a single beam of moonlight penetrating through the winter sky, right onto the trash.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You want the light to penetrate you, so you put your face in the way of the beam and it shoots clear through you. Your mouth fills with the taste of 鉄 (てつ).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The clear, penetrating beam tastes exactly like iron, which is something you really weren't expecting. But now it's filling your entire mouth and you don't want it to stop.
Ru_Meaning: penetrate, clear, pierce, strike home, sit up (all night)
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 撤 (テツ отзывать, убирать).
Ru_Words:
徹するてっする
  • кн. проникать, пронизывать
    • warodai
    徹すとおす
  • длиться, как 2-й компонент сложн. гл. указывает на непрерывность действия
  • провести (напр. законопроект), довести до конца что-л
  • пропускать (через какое-л. отверстие), давать пройти
    • 徹夜てつや
  • бодрствование всю ночь, бессонная ночь
    • warodai
    徹底てってい
  • последовательный, исчерпывающий, доскональный
    • warodai
    貫徹かんてつ
  • осуществление, исполнение, реализация, довершение
  • проникновение
    • warodai
    一徹いってつ
  • упорство, непоколебимость
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 厶 (значок МУ), 彳 (шаг), 攵 (складной стул), 月 (месяц)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you take a step (彳) to grow up (育) you'll strike (攵) and go through
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Cut the queue and you will get a thorough talking to from the restaurant manager.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from " Ge " from " and " like a diet is completed, the shape of utensils removed, the original meaning is removed. "Rituals. Country Shooting Ceremony": "Nai Che Feng and Wang", Zheng Xuan's note: "Tru, except."

The oracle bone inscriptions may be from " Chou " and "廾", " Chou " is like a hand, and " Chou " is like two hands. Inscriptions at plus from " fire ," or from " and " from " Po classical form near" and "Wen said." Xiaozhuan from "彳" from " education " from " shui ", "彳" is like a street. Yang Shuda believes that " education " is assumed to be " meat ", and it means holding meat on the road.

Oracle is used as place names and personal names. Jinwen means governance, and the historical wall disc: "Use Zhou Bang to be used." That is to govern Zhou Bang. "poetry. Daya. "Jiang Han": "Through My Territory", Zheng Xuanjian: "Govern My Border in the World." Also used as a name.

"Said Wen": "Through, pass also. Cong Yi Cong Yu Cong Yu. 𢖉, the ancient text is thorough."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from " Ge " from " and " like a diet is completed, the shape of utensils removed, the original meaning is removed.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「鬲」從「又」，象飲食完畢，撤去食具之形，本義是撤除。《儀禮．鄉射禮》：「乃徹豐與觶」，鄭玄注：「徹，除。」

　　甲骨文或從「丑」、「廾」，「丑」象手形，「廾」象兩手之形。金文下加從「火」，或不從「又」而從「攴」，與《說文》古文形近。小篆從「彳」從「育」從「攴」，「彳」象街道，楊樹達認為「育」假借為「肉」，會以手持肉上路之意，姑備一說。

　　甲骨文用為地名、人名。金文表示治理，史牆盤：「用肇徹周邦。」即是治理周邦。《詩．大雅．江漢》：「徹我疆土」，鄭玄箋：「治我疆界於天下」。又用作人名。

　　《說文》：「徹，通也。从彳从攴从育。𢖉，古文徹。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「鬲」從「又」，象飲食完畢，撤去食具之形，本義是撤除。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
徹 (Simplified: 彻)
Pinyin: chè
English Definition: thorough; penetrating; to pervade; to pass through
Total strokes: 15; Radical: 彳
Pictophonetic: 彳 indicates the sound; 切 (cut) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿲ Left to middle and right
    • 彳 [ chì ] to step with the left foot
    • 育 [ yù ] to produce, to give birth to; to educate
    • 攵 [ pū ] to rap, to tap; script; to let go
Example Words:
徹底 [ chè dǐ ]: thorough; thoroughly; complete
徹夜 [ chè yè ]: the whole night
More: 徹* | *徹 | *徹*

甲骨文從「 鬲 」從「 又 」，象飲食完畢，撤去食具之形，本義是撤除。《儀禮．鄉射禮》：「乃徹豐與觶」，鄭玄注：「徹，除。」 甲骨文或從「 丑 」、「 廾 」，「 丑 」象手形，「 廾 」象兩手之形。金文下加從「 火 」，或不從「 又 」而從「 攴 」，與《說文》古文形近。小篆從「 彳 」從「 育 」從「 攴 」，「 彳 」象街道，楊樹達認為「 育 」假借為「 肉 」，會以手持肉上路之意，姑備一說。 甲骨文用為地名、人名。金文表示治理，史牆盤：「用肇徹周邦。」即是治理周邦。《詩．大雅．江漢》：「徹我疆土」，鄭玄箋：「治我疆界於天下」。又用作人名。 《說文》：「徹，通也。从彳从攴从育。𢖉，古文徹。」

Yang Shuda believes that " education" is assumed to be " meat", and it means holding meat on the road. Oracle is used as place names and personal names. 徹字的基本解释

徹
chè
见“彻”。

徹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chè］
［《廣韻》丑列切，入薛，徹。］
［《廣韻》直列切，入薛，澄。］
“彻1”的繁体字。“池3”的被通假字。
(1)撤除，撤去。
(2)拆毁；拆下。
(3)剥；取。
(4)通，贯通。
(5)引申为透；渗透。
(6)达，到。
(7)道，轨辙。
(8)治；治理。
(9)相传为周代的田税制度。
(10)动，触动。
(11)明；显明。
(12)列；排列。
(13)尽，完。
(14)谓到底，彻底。
(15)紧密貌。
(16)通“”。枣名。
(17)同“澈”。清澄。

徹字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　徹； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页371第10
〔古文〕??【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?直列切，音轍。【說文】通也。【論語】盍徹乎。【註】周法，什一而稅，謂之徹。徹，通也，爲天下之通法。　又【廣韻】徹，達也。【左傳·成十六年】養由基蹲甲而射之，徹七札焉。【註】發達七札也。　又【集韻】徹，道也。　又剝取也。【詩·豳風】徹彼桑土。　又治也。【詩·大雅】徹田爲糧。【傳】徹，治也。　又去也。【儀禮·士冠禮】徹筮席。【左傳·宣十二年】軍衞不徹警也。【周禮·天官·膳夫】卒食以樂，徹于造。【疏】天子食終徹器之時，作樂以徹之。　又毀也。【詩·小雅】徹我牆屋。【箋】徹毀我牆屋也。　又【揚子·方言】徹，列也。【蔡邕·獨斷】羣臣異姓有功封者，稱曰徹侯，避武帝諱，改曰通侯，或曰列侯也。　又【唐韻】丑列切【集韻】【正韻】敕列切，?闡入聲。義同。【集韻】或作〈足?〉。

小篆楷体

暂无。

Traditional characters of "彻1". "Pool 3" was passed falsely.
(1) Removal, removal.
(2) Demolition; dismantle.
(3) Strip; take.
(4) Through, through.
(5) By extension, penetration; penetration.
(6) Reach, arrive.
(7) Road, track.
(8) Governance; governance.
(9) According to legend, it was the land tax system of the Zhou Dynasty.
(10) Move, touch.
(11) Clear; obvious.
(12) Column; arrangement.
(13) End, end.
(14) In the end, thoroughly.
(15) Close appearance.
(16) Pass "". Date name.
(17) Same as "Che". Clear.
thorough
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [彳字部] 　 Toru; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 371 10
〔古文〕??【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Inline cut, sound track. [Said Wen] Tong Ye. [The Analects of Confucius] Straight through. [Note] Weekly law, tithe tax, it is quite thorough. Thorough, tongye, is the universal law of the world.　[Guangyun] Toru, Tatsuya. [Zuo Zhuan·Sixteen years of adulthood] Raise your base and shoot it in armour, piercing through seven Zhayan. [Note] Developed seven Zha also.　[Jiyun] Thorough, Tao.　 Strip it again. 【Poetry·Binfeng】Through the earth.　 You Zhiya. 【Poetry·Taya】Truta is food. [Biography] Thoroughly, governance also.　Go again. 【Rituals·Shiguan Ceremony】Through the feast. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Twelve Years] The military and guards did not fully understand the police. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Send Husband】You eat to enjoy yourself, and you are thorough in creating. 【Sparse】When the emperor eats his food, he will be happy to learn it.　It's ruined again. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Through my wall house. [Paper] It's ruined my wall house.　[Yangtze Dialect] Toru, Lie Ye. [Cai Yong·Arbitrary] Those who have made meritorious appointments with different surnames are called Che Hou, avoiding the taboo of Emperor Wu, and changed to Tong Hou, or Lie Hou.　[Tang Yun] Ugly Lieqie [Jiyun] [Zhengyun] Lieqie, interpret the sound. The same meaning. [Ji Yun] or as "foot?".

Name meaning

chè
вм. 彻
Radicals: 彳, 月, 夂  (loiter, moon, winter, trash)
Meaning Mnemonic
You decide to loiter next to the trash under the moon in winter so the moon's light will penetrate you. The sky is clearest in winter, and this spot next to the trash happens to get the most of it.
Picture a single beam of moonlight penetrating through the winter sky, right onto the trash.
Reading Mnemonic
You want the light to penetrate you, so you put your face in the way of the beam and it shoots clear through you. Your mouth fills with the taste of 鉄 (てつ).
The clear, penetrating beam tastes exactly like iron, which is something you really weren't expecting. But now it's filling your entire mouth and you don't want it to stop.
